short.ar: صائدي الانجراف! اختر سيارتك المفضلة للانجراف وابدأ الانجراف على طرق متحدّرة مختلفة.
short.am: የትንሽ ሁኔታዎን ይምረጡ! የሚያሳዝነው የየትኛው ዲራልት መምሪያዎን ይምረጡ እና በታይ፣ ድንጋይ ያላቸውን መልዕክቶች ላይ ማስመዝገብ እንድችል እዚህ ስልኮችን ይጫኑ።
short.bg: Ловци на дрифт! Изберете любимата си дрифт кола и започнете да дрифтувате по различни предизвикателни пътища.
short.bn: ড্রিফট হান্টারস! আপনার পছন্দের ড্রিফট কার চয়ন করুন এবং বিভিন্ন চ্যালেঞ্জিং রাস্তাগুলি উপর ড্রিফট শুরু করুন।
short.ca: Cacadors de deriva! Trieu el vostre cotxe de deriva preferit i comenceu a fer deriva en rutes diferents i desafiantes.
short.cs: Loveci na drift! Vyberte si svůj oblíbený driftovací vůz a začněte driftovat po různých náročných cestách.
short.da: Driftjægere! Vælg din foretrukne driftbil og begynd at drifte på udfordrende, forskellige veje.
short.de: Driftjäger! Wählen Sie Ihr Lieblingsdriftauto und beginnen Sie mit dem Driften auf anspruchsvollen, unterschiedlichen Straßen.
short.el: Κυνηγοί της ολίσθησης! Επιλέξτε το αγαπημένο σας αυτοκίνητο ολίσθησης και αρχίστε να ολισθαίνετε σε προκλητικούς, διάφορους δρόμους.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Choose your favorite drift car and start drifting on challenging, different roads.
short.es: Cazadores de derrapes. ¡Elige tu coche de derrape favorito y comienza a derrapar en diferentes y desafiantes carreteras!
short.es_419: Cazadores de derrapes. Elige tu auto de derrape favorito y comienza a derrapar en diferentes y desafiantes caminos.
short.et: Driftijahid! Valige oma lemmik driftiauto ja alustage driftimist erinevatel väljakutsetega teedel.
short.fa: شکارچیان دریفت! انتخاب خودروی مورد علاقه خود را بکنید و در کنار جاده‌های متنوع و چالشی دریفت کنید.
short.fi: Drift-metsästäjät! Valitse suosikki drift-auto ja aloita driftaaminen haastavilla, erilaisilla teillä.
short.fil: Mga Manlilipad Drift! Pumili ng iyong paboritong drift car at magsimula ng drifting sa mga nakakatalunton at magkaibang mga kalsada.
short.fr: Chasseurs de drifts ! Choisissez votre voiture de drift préférée et commencez à dériver sur des routes différentes et difficiles.
short.gu: ડ્રિફ્ટ હન્ટર્સ! તમારી પસંદગીની ડ્રિફ્ટ કાર પસંદ કરો અને વિવિધ અને ચુંબકારી રસ્તાઓ પર ડ્રિફ્ટ કરવા શરૂ કરો.
short.he: ציידי רימונים! בחר את הרכב הרימון האהוב עליך והתחל לרכבן בדרכים אתגריות ושונות.
short.hi: ड्रिफ्ट हंटर्स! अपनी पसंदीदा ड्रिफ्ट कार चुनें और चुनौतीपूर्ण, विभिन्न सड़कों पर ड्रिफ्टिंग करना शुरू करें।
short.hr: Lovci na drift! Odaberite svoj omiljeni automobil za drift i započnite s driftingom na izazovnim, različitim cestama.
short.hu: Drift vadászok! Válassza ki kedvenc drift autóját, és kezdjen el driftelni kihívást jelentő, különböző utakon.
short.id: Pemburu Drift! Pilih mobil drift favorit Anda dan mulai drifting di jalan-jalan yang menantang dan berbeda.
short.it: Cacciatori di derapate! Scegli la tua auto da derapata preferita e inizia a derapare su strade diverse e impegnative.
short.ja: ドリフトハンターズ！ お気に入りのドリフトカーを選んで、挑戦的な異なる道路でドリフトを開始しましょう。
short.kn: ಡ್ರಿಫ್ಟ್ ಹಂಟರ್ಸ್! ನಿಮ್ಮ ಆದರಣೆಯ ಡ್ರಿಫ್ಟ್ ಕಾರುವನ್ನು ಆರಿಸಿ ವಿವಿಧ ಕಷ್ಟಕರವಾದ ರಸ್ತೆಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಡ್ರಿಫ್ಟ್ ಮಾಡುವ ಹೊರಟುಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.
short.ko: 드리프트 헌터스! 좋아하는 드리프트 자동차를 선택하고 도전적이고 다른 도로에서 드리프트를 시작하세요.
short.lt: Driftavimo medžiotojai! Pasirinkite mėgstamą driftavimo automobilį ir pradėkite driftuoti iššūkių kupinose, skirtingose keliuose.
short.lv: Izdzīvotāji! Izvēlieties savu iecienīto izlīdzināšanas automašīnu un sāciet izlīdzināties uz izaicinošiem, dažādiem ceļiem.
short.ml: ഡ്രിഫ്റ്റ് ഹണ്ടേർസ്! നിങ്ങളുടെ ഇഷ്ടപ്പെട്ട ഡ്രിഫ്റ്റ് കാർ തിരഞ്ഞെടുക്കുക, പരിശ്രമപ്പെടുന്ന, വ്യത്യസ്ത റോഡുകളിൽ ഡ്രിഫ്റ്റ് ചെയ്യുക.
short.mr: ड्रिफ्ट हंटर्स! आपल्या आवडत्या ड्रिफ्ट कार निवडा आणि संघर्षक, विविध रस्त्यांवर ड्रिफ्टिंग सुरू करा.
short.ms: Pemburu Drift! Pilih kereta drift kegemaran anda dan mulakan untuk melumba di jalan yang mencabar dan berbeza.
short.nl: Driftjagers! Kies uw favoriete driftauto en begin te driften op uitdagende, verschillende wegen.
short.no: Driftjegere! Velg din favorittdriftbil og begynn å drifte på utfordrende, ulike veier.
short.pl: Wybierz swój ulubiony samochód do driftu i rozpocznij drifting na trudnych, różnych drogach.
short.pt_BR: Caçadores de drift! Escolha o seu carro de drift favorito e comece a derrapar em estradas desafiadoras e diferentes.
short.pt_PT: Caçadores de drift! Escolha o seu carro de drift favorito e comece a derrapar em estradas desafiantes e diferentes.
short.ro: Vânători de drifting! Alegeți-vă mașina de drifting preferată și începeți să derapați pe drumuri diferite și provocatoare.
short.ru: Охотники за дрифтом! Выберите свою любимую дрифт-машину и начните дрифтовать на сложных, различных дорогах.
short.sk: Lovci na drift! Vyberte si svoje obľúbené driftovacie auto a začnite driftovať na náročných, rôznych cestách.
short.sl: Lovci na drift! Izberite svoj najljubši drift avto in začnite drseti po zahtevnih, različnih cestah.
short.sr: Lovci na drift! Izaberite svoj omiljeni automobil za drift i započnite sa driftingom na izazovnim, različitim putevima.
short.sv: Driftjägare! Välj din favoritdriftbil och börja drifta på utmanande, olika vägar.
short.sw: Wawindaji wa Drift! Chagua gari lako la kutumbukiza la kupenda na anza kutumbukiza kwenye barabara zenye changamoto na tofauti.
short.ta: டிரிப்ட் ஹன்டர்ஸ்! உங்கள் பிரியமான டிரிப்ட் காரை தேர்ந்தெடுக்கவும் மற்றும் ஆவணப்படுத்தல்கள் மிகவும் சாத்தியமான வழிகளில் டிரிப்ட்…
short.te: డ్రిఫ్ట్ హంటర్స్! మీ ఇష్టమైన డ్రిఫ్ట్ కారును ఎంచుకోండి మరియు కాంక్షలను ఉన్న వివిధమైన రోడ్లలో డ్రిఫ్ట్ చేయడానికి ప్రారంభించండి.
short.th: นักล่าดริฟท์! เลือกรถดริฟท์ที่คุณชื่นชอบและเริ่มดริฟท์บนถนนที่ท้าทายและแตกต่างกัน.
short.tr: Drift Avcıları! Favori drift aracınızı seçin ve zorlu, farklı yollarda drift yapmaya başlayın.
short.uk: Мисливці за дріфтом! Виберіть свою улюблену машину для дріфту та почніть дрейфувати на викликів, різних дорогах.
short.vi: Thợ săn Drift! Hãy chọn chiếc xe drift yêu thích của bạn và bắt đầu drifting trên các con đường khác nhau và đầy thách thức.
short.zh_CN: 漂移猎手！选择您喜爱的漂移赛车，开始在具有挑战性的不同道路上漂移。
short.zh_TW: 漂移獵人！選擇您喜愛的漂移車並開始在具有挑戰性的不同道路上漂移。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
Get ready to experience the adrenaline-pumping world of "Extreme Japan Drift Game"! Immerse yourself in the heart of Japan's vibrant street racing culture and become a legendary drift king in this high-octane game.

🚗 Choose Your Dream Ride: Select from a wide range of meticulously detailed, iconic Japanese, european and american sports cars, including legendary classics and modern marvels. Customize your vehicle with a vast array of performance upgrades, paint jobs, and decals to make it uniquely yours.

🏁 Take on the Toughest Tracks: Race through stunning, real-world-inspired locations across Japan. From neon-lit urban streets to winding mountain passes, each track offers a unique challenge that will test your drifting skills to the limit.

🌟 Master the Art of Drifting: Perfect your drifting technique as you slide around corners at breakneck speeds. Feel the rush as you initiate a perfect drift, leaving a trail of smoke and impressing the crowd. The more stylish and precise your drifts, the more points and rewards you'll earn.

🏆 Compete in Intense Races: Go head-to-head against skilled AI opponents or challenge friends in thrilling multiplayer races. Prove your supremacy in a variety of race modes, including Time Trials, Drift Battles, and Championship Races.

💥 Unlock and Upgrade: Earn rewards for your skills and dedication, allowing you to unlock new cars, upgrade your existing ones, and enhance your drifting abilities. Dominate the leaderboards and become the ultimate drift champion.

🌆 Explore the Japanese Car Culture: Immerse yourself in the rich culture of Japanese street racing. Discover hidden garages, meet fellow racers, and uncover the secrets of the underground racing scene.

🎶 Epic Soundtrack: Feel the rush of the race with a dynamic soundtrack that perfectly complements the high-speed action. Customize your racing experience by choosing your favorite tunes to accompany your adventures.

📸 Capture the Moment: Share your most epic drifts and race victories with the world. Take stunning in-game photos and videos to showcase your skills and brag about your achievements on social media.

"Extreme Japan Drift Car Racing" offers an authentic and exhilarating drift racing experience like no other. Strap in, rev your engines, and prepare for a journey through the heart of Japan's underground racing scene. Are you ready to become the ultimate drift king? Download now and start your journey to glory!

HOW TO PLAY
You can move the car with the arrow keys, space and W-A-S-D keys. You can use nitro with the shift key.

HOW TO INSTALL
Click download this Extension using the "Add to Chrome" button.

Once the game has finished loading, simply select the "Extensions Icon" button. 

After clicking this, you'll be directed to the playground area, where the game "Extreme Japan Drift Game" will launch automatically. All that's left is to press the play button and start enjoying the game.
